text: Hello, my name is Alex Dupont, I am eighteen years old and I am a student in "Science de l'éducation" in Rennes 2. But why do I want to study this ? First, I want to become a teacher and when I did some research about education , I found "Science de l'éducation", I found it interesting so I did two hours in a class last year and I followed this idea during all the rest of the year, and now I am here. Secondly, why do I want to become a teacher ? Where and when did I found this idea ? Actually, I knew that I wanted to do this during my childhood , when I was just a kid I always liked to help others for our works and when I grew up this feeling of caring about childs and sharing my knowledge was still inside of me. Indeed, when I think about it, I just find it so important to be here for people and mainly to kids, they are the future of our world and everyone need them , and the simple idea of being here when they are sort of building themselves makes me feel joyfu , kind of proud and I know that by being a teacher, I will have an important role and I will like it. Then, I don't want to do this job only because I find it important, interesting, etc... I also found my inspiration in everdays'life , it isn't my own idea, it is the one of others who shared it to me by making me admire them. Indeed, I always admired the great situations of education, and by saying this I don't only mean teachers and school, I also talk about famil or, society in general . And these situatons may be truly inspiring if they are done in a positive, healthy and inclusive way. However, they can also be a disaster and when I see all of this, I just want to participate for it to change. Finally, there is also the idea of educating ourselves that always interested me , finding the elements for our self-construction in art or even in class is more than important so the idea of being here as a teacher more as an help than a boss or whatever inspirate me and all of this is why I want to study about education and to become a teacher.
